userreviews.userReview:
Who can resist a flaming hot Werewolf paranormal romance, especially when said werewolf finds his true mate and loses her all in one night, only to grieve her disappearance for THIRTY years? My Wolf Protector by Rose Wynters is filled with everything this wolf-lover loves! Marrok is a hot, handsome, strong, protective, alpha wolf, normally rigidly self-controlled, but he has scented his mate on a dark, secluded road and she is in trouble. Taylor is a “plus-sized” accountant who finds herself in need of rescuing from a group of drunken bikers. In one of those sigh-worthy moments, Marrok rides in on his motorcycle and saves Taylor, knowing that this amazing creature is his mate for life. When she vanishes off the face of the Earth, he’s destroyed and for thirty years has mourned her loss. When two badly beaten and tortured werewolves come to him and say they were sent by Taylor, what can he do but go after her and save her once again from the nightmare she has been living as a prisoner/guinea pig in a hidden government facility running experiments on werewolves? But Taylor is changed, she is like a zombie, unemotional and guarded. Can Marrok break through her years of imprisonment and drugging to gain her heart and trust? What has been done to her that has kept her looking as youthful as the last time he saw her? Why does this human woman have wolf DNA in her? He’ll kill whoever has touched HIS woman, but first, she has to realize she is only meant for him! Meanwhile, Taylor doesn’t think she is worthy or capable of being with someone like Marrok. Is this going to become a game of cat & mouse?Author Rose Wynters wrote for those of us who are less than perfect according to those impossible “Barbie” standards and did it with creative style and a fresh plot! Firmly establishing her world, and building in strong characters, this crisp and intense tale will keep those pages turning, although you may want oven mitts as the tension heats to boiling between Taylor and Marrok. The character dialogue is spot on and the emotions fly off the pages. With a few comedic breaks from another hot wolf, Connor, I could take a much needed breath as I raced through this captivating read! was riveted from start to finish and will definitely look for more from Rose Wynters’ magic pen.A review copy was provided as part of Ms. Wynters’ blog tour in exchange for my honest review.Publication Date: September 2, 2013Number of Pages: 263Genre: Erotic Romance, Paranormal Romance, Werewolf Romance, and BBW RomanceRecommended Age: ADULTS*This book contains explicit language and extremely sensual adult scenes.* Amazon 
Barnes & Noble 

All Romance Ebooks 

For more reviews check out Tome Tender's Book Blog or find us on Facebook.

Favorite Lines “If you only knew how long I've waited for someone like you to walk into my life.”“Marrok, your mate is alive.”“Well, shit,” he finally muttered to himself. “I hate being left out of the action. This must be what it feels like to be emasculated, and it's a damn shitty feeling.”“Fate can be a dirty bitch, though”“He's just mad that I caught him naked in a tree, outside of the Amish settlement.”When I read book 1 in this series I just fell head over hills for Marrok and to have his story was FABULOUS!Marrok is a warrior to the bone. He's amazing! When he meets his mate Taylor he was so happy and then he woke up and she was gone! No sign, no scent, no word. It breaks my heart! 31 years later 2 almost dead wolves tell them she's been alive this whole time and is being held. Marrok shows his true warrior spirit and reading about him in that moment was spectacular! Amazing!Taylor was terrorized for 31 yrs but, she is such an amazing woman! So strong! Most woman well anyone really would have crumbled but not her! She rose above it gloriously! Rose Wynters does it again! She does it with style, class, and so much yumminess! I never get tired of reading her books they are amazing!I was given his book by author in exchange for an honest reviewFIVE WARRIOR FAIRES

This would have been better, but it needs an editor. Not all the time, just enough to drive me nuts. The storyline was good, and without the errors it would have been even better. I thought a book about a hot Native American werewolf biker would be pretty sweet. I mean, just one of those usually is enough, but a combination of all three? Nice! For the most part it was. The characters were likeable, even lustable. *wink* Marrok is the main character and he's very controlled, but still so yummy. Taylor is his mate who has been captured and put through hell. The way they work themselves back to each other is good, very believable. The way the book wrapped up was good, and I thought it picked up all the pieces nicely. I give it 3 1/2 stars.I received a copy of this book in return for an honest review.

GreatGreatI really enjoyed the second book in this series it has a excellent mystery and romance I love that the women have curvy bodies let's you know big girls are loveable too. I recommend this series to any shifters fan that love to go to that special place and read a good book this is it. I can't wait to read the other books in this series if book one and two are this good I know the other books in the series are also awesome.

Marrok Walker, an Apache werewolf Guardian, had been searching for his one true fated mate when he finally finds her in one Taylor Moore, a BBW human female. Coming to her rescue when she's about to be raped, he brings her to his home intending to complete their mating bond and live in HEA bliss. Plans come to a screeching halt when Taylor mysteriously disappears from his home. To add to the mystery there is no scent or physical evidence to aid in any type of search. Thirty One years later Marrok is just a shell of a man until two badly injured shapeshifters stumble into Wolf Town sharing tales about a lab where those of their kind are being experimented on, including Taylor. A rescue mission is launched with Taylor and the imprisoned shapeshifters liberated. The mysteries continue when it's found that Taylor hasn't aged in the 31 years she's been imprisoned.Little does the werewolf community realize that those behind Hell's Pit aren't ready to give up and that it's sociopath commander has taken a special interest in Taylor. The supernatural community will have to come together to locate and destroy those who run the experimental labs before more of their brethren fall victim to experimentation horrors.Excellent story line and plot premise. Werewolves, with ties to the Native American community, is an excellent analogy to parallel that both are protectors of Earth. Throwing in the evil element about a secretive entity who are looking to hurt the werewolves had implications that it would also be harming Earth imho. Good HAD to triumph or the future would be negatively impacted .....Unfortunately it was a case of good intent bad implementation. Between the time line errors and fine detail/world building that changed from one scene to another I had a hard time following the action adventure story line. If that wasn't enough the characters themselves had no clear personality. Rather, it seemed as if what they believed and how they acted changed from chapter to chapter. The best way I can describe my feeling on this is that their actions at the moment was what the ideal person would do or say in the circumstance instead of adapting their core traits to deal with any angst or internal struggles unique to that character.About 3/4 of the way through this story I had the opinion that this would be a 3 rating for me as I basically enjoyed the story as a whole .. until .. several over the top situations occurred that totally crossed into the 2.5 (more to the 2) range. The potential for spoiler information have me not being specific about this but I will throw out a few totally vague (hypothetical) thoughts. First. when money isn't an issue I would think that security and technology available would be the best on the market. Second, advanced life support, when used, has implications you can't negate. Third, microchips. There are a number of additional issues for me so don't think I'm being nit pickey. I do feel this series as a whole has a lot of potential and merit. I realize it's not my place to be a armchair quarterback but do feel that an experienced editor or even a crit partner/beta reader would result in a far superior end product.

I received this book in exchange for an honest review (Lovers of Paranormal or LoP on Goodreads).Marrok Walker is a guardian with nothing to lose. Ever since he lost his mate thirty one years ago, he just existed now. Then one day, two wolves barely hanging on to their lives arrived in town and brings some good and bad news to them. Marrok finds out that his mate has been alive all this time and in the very state they met in. The bad news is what is happening at the place the wolves escaped from. Now that he knows that she is still alive there is no stopping him from getting to her.Taylor Moore, found herself at the wrong place at the wrong time. Taylor's best friend talked he into going out one night and that when things take a turn for her. She found herself at a lake in the middle of nowhere with a bunch of bikers. But little does she know that her knight is about to rescue her. After she is abducted from Marrok's house, the only hope that she has is that he will rescue her again like he did that first night they met. So when she sees her chance she helps two wolves escape and she tells them where to go. Will things be okay for them after she is rescued or will she still have nightmares about what happens????I recommend this book to others. I loved reading this book. I could hardly put it down. I can't wait to read the next book in this series. Rose has become one of my favorite authors.

I received this book from the author in exchange for an honest review through LOP (Lovers of Paranormal)My only issue was the language during the sex scenes, doesn't fit in with the love that is evident between the couple.My wolf protector begins with Marrok riding around on his bike. He comes across Taylor, who is stuck with some biker guys because he friend took a shine to one. Things begin to turn nasty but Marrok comes and saves the night. He scented his mate and he wasn't going to let her go. Taylor was taken from Marrok. He believes she is dead so he moves pack. Thirty one years later, two nearly dead wolves turn up saying that Taylor sent them to find Marrok. Nothing gets in this wolf's way to get his mate back. But where has she been and has she escaped unscathed? Most of the book revolves around Marrok trying to get Taylor to accept him. Taylor doesn't believe she's his true mate and so she is reluctant. When the pack is faced with the threat that kept her from Marrok for thirty one years, Taylor's secret is out. One twist turns into a heartbreaking, heart thundering few minutes of frantic reading. One revelation results in the **** hitting the fan. And Connor? Bird watching huh? HA!

My Wolf Protector ( Wolf Town Guardians #2 ) by Rose WyntersI received this book from the Author in exchange for an honest review through the “Lovers of Paranormal” Group on Goodreads.com.This book was a great read. This is the 2nd book in the Wolf Town Guardian series, but it can easily be a stand-alone read. All the books in the series follow a similar formula. They all keep a good pace. The characters are well developed and very entertaining. There is romance, plenty of action, mystery, drama and intrigue. In all the books, a Wolf-shifter Guardian finds his mate. The mates are all women with troubled backgrounds, low self esteem and have issues with being fuller figured. But through it all the mated couple find happiness and live happily ever after. I just wish that the language used during the “love scenes” was a little more romantic and loving, instead it feels to me like the dialog is straight out of a porn movie. I loved the steamy imagery, but the dialog made me cringe every time in all 4 of the books. In this book the story is about Marrok and his mate Taylor. This book has it all and is a fantastic, enjoyable book to read. I enjoyed this series immensely and I will be looking out for more of this author’s work.

My Wolf Protector was even better than the first in the series, My Wolf King. The story was much deeper and revolved around more than just the mated pair. In this book, Taylor and Marrok are our fated mates. I felt Taylor was a sweetheart that got dealt a really crappy hand, but focused on trying to save everyone else before herself. She's a very giving soul that desperately needs to be protected. Marrok is our hero, he's cool,calm and collected strapped with major guilt and lack of passion for life in the start of the book. Oh ya, he's also a hot native american motorcycle rider-yummy!! Of course, Caroline an Alexander play a huge role in this book as does some of the characters from the last book;). The plot line was great, it left me guessing as to what was going to happen next. I literally finished this book in a sitting, I couldn't put it down. I enjoyed the fact that these two didn't have a perfect relationship, they had to work for it. It seemed like a far deeper love than you usually get with PNR novels. I'd definitely recommend this to shifter,romance,action and all paranormal lovers. I received this book in exchange for an honest review from the LoP group on Goodreads.com

I received this book in exchange for an honest review (LoP or Lovers of Paranormal)Wolf Town Guardian #2 - Marrok's StoryThe self controlled Marrok was always serious and on guard, since his mate was missing. 31 years ago, he met a plump lady name Taylor, and was his mate. He saved her from a bikers gang when she followed her friend, Nicole. He tried to woo her, taking things slowly but the next morning she was missing without a trace and the whole bikers gang had been slaughtered. He shut himself out until one day he went out and met Alexander and became the guardian ever since. One day, two werewolf come into town, almost dying, saying that Taylor send them after Marrok. And, Connor really lights me up when he fell down from that tree!!This is the story behind Marrok's life. The storyline was really intense with not a single dull moment. Definitely on my Re-Read list.

yada yada yada..."This is their stories."My ears put in the two drum beats from Law and Order SVU (yada yada yada, these are their stories. boom boom)atleast that gives us a measure of where the bar is set for the novel :|*********************this one actually has a story! yay!! the downside, the H flip-flops between being... actually, no, he's just your average dedicated, emotionally-clueless a-H (alpha Hero, or asshole Hero, take your pick). everytime the h reveals something that's hard for her to bear, he reacts angrily and blames her (wtf!), and few paragraphs later, proceeds to kiss her and shag her (eyeroll).

I received this book in exchange for an honest review from the “Lovers of Paranormal” Group on Goodreads.com.I liked this story and I could hardly put it down. I was glad to see Marrok grow in this book. He seemed so sad in lonely in the last book. It took him so many years to find that Taylor was alive only to discover that she was just a shell of the woman she had been. The danger to the wolf community and other supernaturals was horrific. There were some very sad moments in this book as well as some happy ones. I am looking forward to reading the next book.

I was given a copy of this book in exchange for an honest review from Goodreads Lop and the author. Even better than the first book tons of action and danger I couldn't stop turning those pages. The characters and story line are well written and you just fall into this story .I love that the women of this series are curvy girls they are more relatable to me .Definitely a must read for shifter lover s out there.

second in series. good story line, sexy hot alpha male,mysterious bad guy,funny, strong females,. Marrok found and lost his mate all in one night. Thirty years later they are reunited but the mystery still remains why is Taylor still young and what was done to her and the other paranormal held captive.

Soulful heartbreaking sensual inspiringThis read had me weep at both ends. I have been reading love stories since my dad gave me some for Christmas when I was sixteen. My love for romance haven't changed, only the type I read. This one ties my love of sexy shapeshifters and bad boys and Harleys. This is a very good read .it hits all my emotions. A hot and inspiring read
Great book!!! I love this series!! These sexy alpha shifters are awesome. This is a well told story that will keep you reading!Definite series that I will be following!!

description: Wolf Town Guardians - Born to walk this world as both wolf and human, these men take their role as protectors very seriously. Enjoying sensual pleasures as they please, this group of alpha werewolves are the finest when it comes to protecting their hidden settlement.Guardians are the masters of self-control, taking pride in their authority and hard, muscled bodies. That all changes at the first scent of their mates. Their control snaps. The mating heat begins.This is their stories.Book Two, Wolf Town GuardiansResigned to never knowing the truth about his mate's disappearance, Marrok Walker is a guardian with nothing left to lose. Late one night, his entire world is turned upside down when two battered werewolves stumble into Wolf Town. They have escaped from a hidden research facility in New Mexico, only moments away from death. Before losing consciousness, one of them makes a shocking revelation. Marrok discovers his mate is still alive... And desperate to be rescued.Taylor Moore was just your average, virgin accountant, until a series of horrific events altered her life. Plus-sized and loaded down with responsibilities, she lets her best friend talk her into trouble. At the very last moment, she's rescued by a tall, dangerous male riding a motorcycle. It's the start of something wonderful... Until she's abducted from him and taken to Hell's Pit.Thrown into a nightmarish world beneath a mesa, she has held onto the memory of the one night she spent with the handsome, Apache man. When the opportunity comes to help two werewolves escape, she assists them, asking only one thing in return. Find the werewolf named Marrok.Now that he knows his mate is alive, Marrok won't let anything stand in the way of reclaiming her. Planning a daring rescue, the guardians free the prisoners, but can he free Taylor from the ties that bind her?His mate is no longer the same woman he knew, but the mating heat doesn't care. It explodes, burning them both up alive. Taylor can't resist the hot, alpha werewolf, but Marrok is known for his rigid self-control. Her past is coming back to haunt her.... Will she be able to seduce the wild and savage man before it does?
title:
My Wolf Protector
      
          (Wolf Town Guardians #2)
